p: From the powder X-ray diffractometric profiles shown in Figure 5, the molecularly dissolved state of MTX in the solid SMEDDS was further verified. MTX showed a typical crystalline pattern ( Figure 5A) similar with a reported literature, 1 but these representative peaks were not seen in the PXRD pattern of solid SMEDDS, because the drug existed as an amorphous form in solid SMEDDS ( Figure 5D).
